return: Returns a value from a function.
while: Loops while a condition is true.
try: Begins a block for exception handling.
as: Defines an alias or alternative name.
nonlocal: Declares a variable in outer scope.
continue: Skips to the next loop iteration.
assert: Checks a condition, raises error if false.
from: Imports specific items from a module.
and: Checks if all conditions are true.
or: Checks if any condition is true.
abs: Returns absolute value of a number.
all: Returns True if all elements are true.
any: Returns True if any element is true.
callable: Checks if an object is callable.
delattr: Deletes an attribute from an object.
dir: Returns a list of attributes and methods.
filter: Filters elements based on a function.
hasattr: Checks if object has named attribute.
hash: Returns the hash value of an object.
isinstance: Checks if object is instance of class.
issubclass: Checks if class is subclass of another.
iter: Returns an iterator for an object.
len: Returns the length of an object.
pow: Returns value of x raised to y.
setattr: Sets an attribute on an object.
type: Returns the type of an object.
EOFError: Error raised when end of file reached.
NameError: Raised when variable is not found.
cgru: CGRU is an open-source render management system for VFX and animation.
cgru.afanasy: The core module of CGRU used for distributed rendering management.
cgru.dailies: CGRU module for managing daily tasks and reviews in production.
cgru.pathcurdir: Module in CGRU for handling current directory paths.
cgru.pathmap: Path mapping module in CGRU for redirecting paths across systems.
cgru.rules: CGRU module defining rules for rendering and task management.
cgruconfig: Configuration module for CGRU, used to set up environment settings.
cgrudocs: Documentation module for CGRU, containing help and guidelines.
cgrules: Module related to rule management in CGRU for rendering tasks.
cgrupathmap: Module in CGRU for advanced path mapping functionality.
cgruutils: Utility functions and tools in CGRU for supporting render management.
afanasy: Afanasy is a part of CGRU, a render farm management tool.
cgru.server: Server module of CGRU, handles communication between clients and the render farm.
cgru.client: Client module of CGRU, submits render jobs to the farm.
cgru.blender: Blender integration module for CGRU render farm management.
afanasy.task: Represents a single render task within Afanasy.
afanasy.job: Defines a job in Afanasy, consisting of multiple tasks.
afanasy.farm: The network of machines managed by Afanasy for rendering tasks.
afanasy.monitor: A GUI tool in CGRU for monitoring render farm activities.
cgru.utils: Utility functions and tools in CGRU, aiding in render farm management.
afanasy.api: API for interacting with the Afanasy render management system.
TimeoutError: Operation exceeded the allowed time limit.
ModuleNotFoundError: Raised when a module could not be found.
StopIteration: Raised when an iterator has no more items.
